title: Battle Boss Blitzcrank pathing
body: Has anyone noticed the pathing is a lot worse than his other models? Especially pathing the minion waves. Maybe I'm on crack, but I swear...

replies.body:
Hiya! 

I personally haven't noticed a difference, but I can poke around and see if there's something different about the skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tvaNAnJX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-04T18:06:08.922+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> I personally haven't noticed a difference, but I can poke around and see if there's something different about the skin.

Thank you! It just feels different say from Boom Boom Blitz. I'll give you an example from last night. Exiting top base along with our minion wave. I was attempting to chase down 1 enemy. The wave actually blocked me from exiting the base "stairs" and then made me try path around the melee minions. Obviously this caused me to miss the opportunity to make a kill. I have never encountered something like that playing 2 other Blitz skins. It just seems off ever so slightly.

I didn't forget! 

This may have been an issue with pathing in general. I've had similar experiences with other champions and minion collision. 

I took a look at Battle Boss Blitzcrank, as well as base and iBlitzcrank, and I didn't notice differences between pathing. It may appear different due to Battle Boss Blitzcrank having an entirely different run cycle than his other skins and him appearing a bit more bulky.

Thank you very much for looking into this! I did get stuck once between the wall and minion last week which resulted in a death haha. I was at full life, Vayne was at 20%. Bad situation all around. Other than that no other issues. Perhaps I've gotten used to the new dimensions and run.

You're welcome! 

Gah, I've had similar things happen and it's the worst. D: If you have any other issues with him, lemme know and I can take a look!
